page.title: 15HOUSING SURVEY.
page.content: There are only two blocks containing a proportion of residential {property}. The most common type of{property}is {semi-detatched.}These{semi-detatched houses are old, modern, or they are sometimes{cottages}or{flats.}A number of old or modern big houses, have or are being converted into{flats.}These {flats}are being rented for quite a high price and the ones on Stamford Rd. are very luxurious.The most uncommon type of residential{property are bungalows. Hardly any people live in these, as most people have families and need larger houses, and single people cannot afford to buy bungalows,so they rent{flats. In the Bowdon Vale section of the block,Quasi-semi detatched properties. Most of this is{Council}owned {property.
